name: Broccoli with Garlic and Lemon
title: Broccoli with Garlic and Lemon
instructions: Chop the florets from the broccoli and wash them.
Add 2-3 tablespoons of water, as well as the juice of the lemon to a large pan (with a lid) and bring up to a medium heat.
When the water starts to steam, add the florets and steam for around 10 minutes.
In a separate pan, add the butter and melt on a low-medium heat.
Crush, press or mince the garlic. Add it to the butter once it starts bubbling.
Gently cook for 5 or so minutes, then transfer to the pan with the broccoli.
Add salt and pepper (about 1/2 teaspoon) to the pan and mix the contents.
Ready to serve. Enjoy on its own or as part of another dish.
